title: EXPERT Creative Writer (or journalist) to help craft Business Startup's Story for PR Attention
snippet:
I am working with a startup that have just signed a major deal that will significantly expose their business.
They want to use this opportunity as a leverage point to attract press and media attention in business and entrepreneurship focused publications.
I am looking for an expert creative writer who understands how journalism works to help craft their story in a way that grabs the media's attention when we start submitting the release. 
A background in journalism, business PR and creative writing will be the most desirable set of skills required to tackle this project.
